title: New Twitter CEO Parag Agrawal Restructures Leadership Team; Moves quickly follow departure of Jack Dorsey late last month
text:
Kayvon Beykpour, Bruce Falck and Nick Caldwell would be general managers for consumer, revenue and core tech, respectively, leading teams across engineering, product management, design and research.

In addition, Lindsey Iannucci joined the leadership team as chief of staff and vice president of operations.

Mr. Agrawal, previously Twitter's chief technology officer, took over as CEO in late November, succeeding Jack Dorsey, the company's co-founder and one of Silicon Valley's most prominent figures.

Bret Taylor, Salesforce.com Inc. president and chief operating officer, was named chairman of the board.

Write to Maria Armental at maria.armental@wsj.com

New Twitter CEO Parag Agrawal Restructures Leadership Team
